text: Baltra is a Chilean surname. ==People with the name== * Alberto Baltra (1912–1981), Chilean politician and economist * Mireya Baltra (born 1932), Chilean sociologist, journalist, and politician * Ruth Baltra Moreno (1938–2014), Chilean actress, dramatist, teacher, and theater director ==See also== * Baltra Island, Galápagos Islands, Ecuador ==References== Category:Spanish-language surnames
title: Baltra (surname)
